Lunch Entrées

Lunch at the Lobster House Restaurant is served Monday thru Saturday from 11:30am thru 3:00pm. Ordering from our regular menu is permitted during lunch hours. All lunch entrees’ are served with soup or salad. Choice of french fries, baked potato, rice or linguine, coffee or tea and complimentary dessert of the day.

All of our House Sandwiches are served with French fries, cole slaw and pickles.
